Jorge Martinez

2800 Clarendon Blvd · Arlington, VA 22201 · (202) 531-6203 · jem318@georgetown.edu

I am a seasoned professional with 10+ years of cybersecurity and IT consulting experience in diverse sectors. Recognized for demonstrating a natural aptitude for security architecture design, as well as for threat detection and risk mitigation. As such, I have consistently exceeded performance goals, and I am adept at achieving maximum operational impacts with minimal resource expenditure.

Interests

Apart from being a web developer, I enjoy most of my time being outdoors. In the winter, I am an avid skier and novice ice climber. During the warmer months here in Colorado, I enjoy mountain biking, free climbing, and kayaking.

When forced indoors, I follow a number of sci-fi and fantasy genre movies and television shows, I am an aspiring chef, and I spend a large amount of my free time exploring the latest technology advancements in the front-end web development world.
